SELECT tj.id, tj.sur_time,#协催时间 tj.apply_count,#协催总次数 tj.hj,# tj.shb,# tj.dx,# tj.average_case_apply_count
FROM (
SELECT LEFT( ca.sur_time,10) AS sur_time,ca.state,ca.`apply_type`,ca.`id`,
SUM(CASE WHEN (ca.`apply_type` = '4' OR ca.`apply_type` = '6' OR ca.`apply_type` = '12') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS apply_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ca.`apply_type` = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS hj, SUM(CASE WHEN ca.`apply_type` = '6' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS shb, SUM(CASE WHEN ca.`apply_type` = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dx, ROUND(CONVERT((IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (ca.`apply_type` = '4' OR ca.`apply_type` = '6' OR ca.`apply_type` = '12') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) / IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT ca.case_id), 0)),DECIMAL(18,0))) AS average_case_apply_count
FROM `case_apply` ca
GROUP BY LEFT( ca.sur_time,10) ORDER BY ca.sur_time DESC ) AS tj WHERE tj.state='1'
and sur_time BETWEEN '${params.sur_time}' AND'${params.sur_time1}'
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by sur_time desc

AND tj.id IN
#{id}
order by sur_time desc
